net.floodlightcontroller.core.internal

类 OFConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.core.internal.OFConnection
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IOFConnection, IOFConnectionBackend, IOFMessageWriter

    public class OFConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOFConnection, IOFConnectionBackend
    Implementation of an openflow connection to switch. Encapsulates a Channel, and provides message write and request/response handling capabilities.
    作者:
    Andreas Wundsam

    • 构造器概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • write

        public java.util.Collection<org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage> write(java.lang.Iterable<org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage> msgList)
        All write methods chain into this write() to use WriteMessageTask. Write the list of messages to the switch
        指定者:
        write 在接口中 IOFMessageWriter
        参数:
        msgList - list of messages to write
        返回:
        list of failed messages; can only fail if channel disconnected

      • write

        public boolean write(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage m)
        Write the single message to the channel
        指定者:
        write 在接口中 IOFMessageWriter
        参数:
        m -
        返回:
        true upon success; false upon failure; can only fail if channel disconnected

      • writeRequest

        public <R extends org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage> com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<R> writeRequest(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFRequest<R> request)
        从接口复制的说明: IOFMessageWriter
        write an OpenFlow Request message, register for a single corresponding reply message or error message.
        指定者:
        writeRequest 在接口中 IOFMessageWriter
        返回:
        a Future object that can be used to retrieve the asynchrounous response when available. If the connection is not currently connected, will return a Future that immediately fails with a @link{SwitchDisconnectedException}.

      • writeStatsRequest

        public <REPLY extends org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFStatsReply> com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<java.util.List<REPLY>> writeStatsRequest(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFStatsRequest<REPLY> request)
        从接口复制的说明: IOFMessageWriter
        write a Stats (Multipart-) request, register for all corresponding reply messages. Returns a Future object that can be used to retrieve the List of asynchronous OFStatsReply messages when it is available.
        指定者:
        writeStatsRequest 在接口中 IOFMessageWriter
        参数:
        request - stats request
        返回:
        Future object wrapping OFStatsReply If the connection is not currently connected, will return a Future that immediately fails with a @link{SwitchDisconnectedException}.

        指定者:

        返回:

      • updateLatency

        public void updateLatency(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.U64 latency)
        从接口复制的说明: IOFConnectionBackend
        Update the present latency between the switch and the controller. The latency should be in milliseconds and should be one-way. The caller must convert all round-trip values to one-way prior to invoking this function. The old link latency being updated will retain X% of the value, while the new link latency will attribute (100-X)%. This should allow new network configurations to quickly overtake old ones but will still allow outlier values to be absorbed.
        指定者:
        updateLatency 在接口中 IOFConnectionBackend
